short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your learning experience on Canvas LMS with AI-integration.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Canvas-Wise is a browser extension that helps you complete your assignments faster by providing AI-generated answers to your questions.

It integrates seamlessly with your Canvas LMS and works on all your courses. On any quiz, test, or exam, Canvas-Wise acts as an autonomous assistant, providing you with the answers you need to succeed automatically.
